actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 2:00 p.m. on May 30, 2023.
The House convened, returning from a recess continuing the legislative day of May 29.
The Speaker announced that the House do now recess for a period of less than 15 minutes.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by Rev. John Kellogg, Christ Church, Washington Parish, Washington, DC.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Dusty Johnson to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
